Shadow Wing:

Somewhere, in the back of Lunarpine's mind, she smiled for him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine stared at the large hole he'd just dug. He hated what he 
was doing
> but it somehow seemed appropriate.
> 
> He transformed back to his bot mode, picked up Shadow Wings frame 
and set it
> in the hole. Smiling down at it he thought "This isn't goodbye 
Wing, you'll
> be back, and this time I won't fail you."
> 
> he returned to wolf mode and began burying the frame.
>
